attributes.action: tell every business we are a 'made in the uk' tell every one buy uk products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MADE IN THE UK. Make EVERY THING in the UK Modern Quality State of the Future Unique And every school to have a one hour class of building inventing future design of all products and then Free college to expand ideas
'Advertise this everywhere' (MADE IN THE UK)
Then appoint each business free easy  tools to make this happen (not as it is now where its all to hard to do... 
MADE IN THE UK = A FUTURE 
i travel a lot and i feel UK is being left behind must act now
